help-file.title: "CREATE GOLEM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necromancer has a suitable corpse at his feet, "Create Golem" will raise one of three types of powerful golems, with their abilities depending on the type of golem raised.
